Help me understand, what's the point of this series?

The point of this series is that the makers needs someone to blame for a lot of things. I watched this a while ago and only watched half of it because it's filled with twisted and plain wrong facts.

The only thing about this series that can be taken for a truth is that if you give someone the time they can make you believe in just about anything.

Religious propaganda nothing else. I just hope people wathing this does so with a critical mind and dont buy in to the nonsence of the series without thinking for them self.
